scripts.dev: nodemon -w src -w src/.vuepress -e md,js,vue,styl --exec 'vuepress dev src'
scripts.traefik: docker ps --filter name=traefik -aq | xargs docker stop | xargs docker rm || true && docker-compose -f docker-compose-traefik.yml up --build -d
scripts.nginx: npm run build && npm run traefik && docker-compose up --build
